# versionHash

**Instance Property**

The version hash for the attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
var versionHash: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The version hash is used to uniquely identify an attribute based on its configuration. This value includes the [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPropertyDescription/versionHash] information from [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPropertyDescription] and the attribute type.

## Related Documentation

- **versionHash**: The version hash for the receiver.
